column1: Baby Barnaby's////Baby Barnaby's is more of a standout than regular Barnaby's
column2: which in my opinion is good but not awesome.  The atmosphere is cozy and fresh
column3: plus all of the food is fantastic.  It can get crowded
column4: so weekdays are best.  If you can't make a weekday
column5: try to go early on the weekend
column6: or at least send one of your party to get on the list.  They won't seat you with only part of your group
column7: but you can get on the list.
